item.title: Speaking Engagements
item.description: “Software Testing: Stories From The Real World” for nbQ, 4 October 2016. [agenda, poster] “Interview with the CEO of Paduin” for Startup Kitchen, 9 November 2013. [video, competitor] “OO Design Patterns in Functional Programming Languages” for Fredericton Developer User Group, 16 January 2013. [slides, repo] “Parallel and Functional Programming” for Fredericton Developer User Group, 22 February 2012. [slides, repo]

item.title: Talk - Software Testing: Stories From The Real World
item.description: Tuesday, 4 October 2016 Software Testing Env What organization culture gives rise to the testing and software development process? What is the testing and software development process? What problems are exhibited by that process? 5 different testing experiences University coding project Tech startup company (web app) Enterprise software consulting project (2) Prominent open source software (Mozilla) Database software (IBM) Career Tips RobinBB software valuation method. Know and satisfy your client.
